T02D2631:124b-1: shr'i sarba durga ti pa ri sho dha ni mandala

T02D2631:128a-23: bdag nyid dbul bar bya ste /

T02D2631:128a-29: las kyi ris su bzhugs pa thams cad dang /
T02D2631:128a-33: dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la bdag nyid dbul gyis /
T02D2631:128a-34: bdag dus thams cad nas rnam pa thams cad du so sor bzhes su gsol lo //
T02D2631:128a-35: zhes brjod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams thams cad du /
T02D2631:128a-36: lus rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa spros pas so so'i zhabs drung du dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2631:128a-37: de nas thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mgon po khyed rnams kyis /
T02D2631:128a-38: dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub bdag la stsal du gsol lo zhes brjod la /
T02D2631:128a-39: dge ba de yang sems can thams cad dang /
T02D2631:128a-41: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gis /
T02D2631:128a-42: bdag dang sems can thams cad /
T02D2631:128a-44: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i bde ba dang ;
T02D2631:128a-45: yid bde ba thams cad kyi mchog sangs rgyas su
T02D2631:128a-46: tshe 'di nyid la thob par gyur cig ces dge
T02D2631:128a-48: sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal la /
T02D2631:128a-49: sems chen pos dmigs par bya ba dang /
T02D2631:128a-50: de las 'don par 'dod pa'i bla na med pa'i sems dang /
T02D2631:128b-0: 'phags pa'i @128b chos kyis yongs su grol ba'i sems mchog tu gyur pa dang /
T02D2631:128b-1: dngos po thams cad la dmigs pa med pa mthar thug pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2631:128b-2: de nas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par
T02D2631:128b-3: dag pa 'od gsal ba tsam dngos po kun gyi
T02D2631:128b-4: mchog tu gyur par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2631:128b-5: de'i rjes la sngags kyi rgyal po brjod par bya ste /
T02D2631:128b-6: aom na mo bha ga ba ti tsitta sarba durga
T02D2631:128b-7: ti pa ri sho dha ni r'a dz'a ya ta
T02D2631:128b-11: aom sho dha ya sho dha ya /
T02D2631:128b-13: sarba karma a'a ba ra na bi shuddhe sv'a h'a /
T02D2631:128b-15: lag pa gnyis mdun du bzhag la /
T02D2631:128b-16: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bcu rdo rje rtse mor gyur pa rnams kyi steng du bsams la /
T02D2631:128b-17: de dag gi steng du rnam par snang mdzad la
T02D2631:128b-18: sogs pa'i sa bon lag pa g-yas pa la bsam
T02D2631:128b-19: pa dang / rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug la
T02D2631:128b-20: sogs pa'i sa bon lag pa g-yon pa la bsam
T02D2631:128b-21: pa dang / par bya ste / de la mthe bong gnyis la /
T02D2631:128b-23: mdzub mo gnyis la h'um zhes bya ba bsam /
T02D2631:128b-24: gung mo gnyis la tr'am zhes bya ba bsam /
T02D2631:128b-25: srin lag gnyis la dhi zhes bya ba bsam /
T02D2631:128b-26: mthe bong gnyis la a'a zhes bya ba bsam /
T02D2631:128b-27: de ltar de dag yongs su gyur ba las /
T02D2631:128b-28: rdo rje la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'o ;
T02D2631:128b-29: / de nyid gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das lnga dang /
T02D2631:128b-32: aom aa n+yo n+y'a nu r'a ga sa ma ya h'um /
T02D2631:128b-34: thabs dang shes rab rjes su chags par bya'o //
T02D2631:128b-35: de nas rdo rje thal mo sbyar te /
T02D2631:128b-36: aom aa n+yo n+ya spha ra spha ra aa nu bra bishta sarba dharm'a sa ma ya h'um /
T02D2631:128b-37: zhes brjod pas thabs dang shes rab thugs rje chen po'i dbang gis snyoms par zhugs par bya'o //
T02D2631:128b-39: aom aa tyanta aa nu pra bishta sarba dharm'a: h'um /
T02D2631:128b-41: chos thams cad gcig la gcig 'dres shing thabs dang
T02D2631:128b-42: shes rab gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po
T02D2631:128b-43: la thugs ye shes kyi lha dang lha mo'i tshogs
T02D2631:128b-44: bskyed pa ste / de la badzra aanydza li bya bas /
T02D2631:128b-45: rdo rje thal mo'i sngags so //
T02D2631:128b-50: ces brjod pas snying gar sdig pa lan gsum dral bar bya'o //
T02D2631:129a-1: bya bas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2631:129a-2: aa zhes pas bdag nyid la ye shes dbab par bya'o //
T02D2631:129a-3: phab pa de nyid 'dis brtan par bya'o //
T02D2631:129a-4: aom tishtha badzra dri dho me bha wa sha shva
T02D2631:129a-5: to me bha ba hri da yam me aa dhi
T02D2631:129a-6: tishtha sarba siddhimme pra yatstsha h'um /
T02D2631:129a-7: ha ha ha ha ho: badzra mushti /
T02D2631:129a-9: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2631:129a-12: de'i rjes la rdo rje phyag rgya nang du bcas la /
T02D2631:129a-15: aom p'a bam a'a karsha ni bi sho dha na
T02D2631:129a-16: bi sho dha na badzra sa ma ya h'um phat
T02D2631:129a-18: aom badzra p'a ni spho ta ya sarba aa p'a
T02D2631:129a-19: ya bandha ni pra mo ksha na sarba aa p'a
T02D2631:129a-20: ya ga te bhya: sarba tr'a sa nan sarba ta
T02D2631:129a-21: th'a ga ta badzra sa ma ya trat /
T02D2631:129a-22: ces brjod la gung mo gnyis mnyam par sbyar la /
T02D2631:129a-23: gzhan ma bzhi po rtse mo sprad de sdig pa thams cad dral bar bya'o //
T02D2631:129a-24: de nas chos thams cad rab tu bsdu ba'i rnam
T02D2631:129a-25: par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2631:129a-26: rgya bcings la / bde bar gshegs pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags lan bdun brjod de /
T02D2631:129a-27: aom sarba mu: zhes pas dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2631:129a-28: de nyid kyis ni dngos grub thams cad yongs su
T02D2631:129a-29: rdzogs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs
T02D2631:129a-30: su rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid can byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2631:129a-31: sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa'i gzugs
T02D2631:129a-32: su 'og min gyi khang pa brtsegs pa gnas pa
T02D2631:129a-34: de nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su /
T02D2631:129a-35: rang gi lha'i snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su /
T02D2631:129a-36: rang gi lha'i snying po dam tshig gis bris la /
T02D2631:129a-37: de nyid la mngon par phyogs pa'i lte ba'i dbus
T02D2631:129a-38: su dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug dang bcas pa
T02D2631:129a-39: / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par yongs su gyur pa dang /
T02D2631:129a-40: yang de'i steng du yi ge ka la sogs pa
T02D2631:129a-41: skar ma'i rnam pa lta bur yongs su gyur pa
T02D2631:129a-42: las / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa nyid du bsam par bya'o //
T02D2631:129a-43: de dag gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du /
T02D2631:129a-44: badzra zhes bya ba'i snying po dang /
T02D2631:129a-45: de las rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs dang bcas par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2631:129a-46: ngan song sbyong ba la sogs pa rnams kyi ni
T02D2631:129a-47: rang rang gi snying po las byung ba'i mtshan ma
T02D2631:129b-0: ste / de dag @129b gi dbus su snying po
T02D2631:129b-1: rnams bkod la rang rang gi phyag rgya'i nga rgyal
T02D2631:129b-2: du bsgom par bya ba ni /
T02D2631:129b-6: rang rang gi snying po yang bzlas shing de bzhin
T02D2631:129b-7: gshegs pa rigs lnga'i byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas
T02D2631:129b-9: rang rang gi phyag rgya la bzhugs par bsams te /
T02D2631:129b-10: badzra tsakra sarba durga ti pa ri sho dha na h'um /
T02D2631:129b-11: zhes pa zlos shing phyag rgya'i gzugs de rnams /
T02D2631:129b-12: badzra bee ro tsa na ra ham /
T02D2631:129b-13: zhes pa la sogs pa brjod par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi /
T02D2631:129b-14: rang rang gi skur byin gyis brlabs pa'i sbyor bas rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur bsgoms la /
T02D2631:129b-15: aom sho dha na sho dha ne sarba a'a ba ra na bi sho dha ne h'um /
T02D2631:129b-16: brjod la ma h'a sa ma ya satva ham /
T02D2631:129b-17: zhes pas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings shing sa ma ya ham /
T02D2631:129b-19: de nas snying ga la sogs pa'i gnas bzhir rdo rje la sogs pa /
T02D2631:129b-24: de nas rang gi snying gar 'khor lo'i phyag rgya las byung ba'i badzra tsakra /
T02D2631:129b-25: zhes pa'i snying pos ngan song thams cad yongs su
T02D2631:129b-26: sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor de ma thag tu sprul la
T02D2631:129b-29: rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2631:129b-30: de yis me tog gi phreng ba blangs nas /
T02D2631:129b-31: snying ga'i dkyil 'khor du badzra sa ma ya /
T02D2631:129b-34: zhes pas dkyil 'khor du dor bar bya'o //
T02D2631:129b-35: de nas aom pra ti grihna tva me sarba ma h'a ba la /
T02D2631:129b-36: zhes bya bas phreng ba blangs la rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2631:129b-37: de nas bdag nyid kyi ma rig pa bsal bar bsams te /
T02D2631:129b-38: aom rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02D2631:129b-39: de ring bdag gis mig dbye mdzad //
T02D2631:129b-40: rdo rje mig ni bla med pas //
T02D2631:129b-41: mig rnams thams cad dbye bar 'gyur //
T02D2631:129b-43: mig phye la he badzra pa shya /
T02D2631:129b-45: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo thams cad bla mar bya'o //
T02D2631:129b-46: de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa las rdo rje chu blangs nas /
T02D2631:129b-49: chu'i dbang blangs nas de nas sangs rgyas dang /
T02D2631:129b-50: phyag rgya la sogs pa'i dbang buddha aa bhi shinytsa aom /
T02D2631:129b-51: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02D2631:130a-2: aom padma aa bhi shinytsa hr'i:/
T02D2631:130a-3: aom karma aa bhi shinytsa a'a:/
T02D2631:130a-4: zhes pa'i spyi bo la sogs pa'i gnas lngar bde bar gshegs pa lngas dbu rgyan bya'o //
T02D2631:130a-5: de bzhin du phyag rgya dang /
T02D2631:130a-12: bde ba chen po'i dbang rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du ma nos la /
T02D2631:130a-15: snying ga la sogs pa'i gnas ji lta ba bzhin du go bgo bar bya zhing /
T02D2631:130a-16: dar dbyangs kyis brgyan par bya'o //
T02D2631:130a-19: lung bstan pa la sogs pa thams cad rgyas par byas nas rang la byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2631:130a-20: rnal 'byor chen po la brtson par bya ste /
T02D2631:130a-21: de la rang gi snying gar zla ba bsams la ma ya a'a zhes brjod cing /
T02D2631:130a-22: ngan song sbyong ba la sogs pa'i gnas su aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /
T02D2631:130a-23: aom sarba durga ti pa ri sho dha na h'um /
T02D2631:130a-24: zhes pas mdun gyi nam mkha' bee ro tsa na aa zhes brjod la dbab par bya'o //
T02D2631:130a-25: badzra be zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2631:130a-26: badzra bee ro ca na ham /
T02D2631:130a-28: phyag rgya dang rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar por bsgoms te /
T02D2631:130a-29: rang gi gnas su dgug pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2631:130a-30: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2631:130a-31: aom badzra bee ro tsa na dandre /
T02D2631:130a-32: zhes bya bas blta bar bya'o //
T02D2631:130a-33: de bzhin du sa ma ya stvam /
T02D2631:130a-37: zhes pa la sogs pas gnas lngar rdo rje la sogs phyag rgyas gyur cing /
T02D2631:130a-38: badzra aa p'a ya sho dha ni h'um /
T02D2631:130a-40: bde bar gshegs pa'i skur gyur par bsam mo //
T02D2631:130a-41: de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2631:130b-3: zhes pas snying po phab la /
T02D2631:130b-4: de nas de dag gyur par gzugs phyag rgya dag ste /
T02D2631:130b-9: rdo rje sems dpa' nas dril bu'i bar du gyur pa'o //
T02D2631:130b-10: de nas da nyid so so'i bar phyag rgya chen po'i skur bsam bar bya ba bzhin /
T02D2631:130b-14: zhes pa'i bar gyis ngan song thams cad dang pos
T02D2631:130b-15: yongs su sbyong ba la sogs pa'i gnas su rang
T02D2631:130b-16: gi rigs las nye bar mtshon pa'i kha dog dang
T02D2631:130b-17: phyag mtshan bsnams pas gnas par gyur pa dang /
T02D2631:130b-18: lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sbyor bas dgug pa dang /
T02D2631:130b-20: dbang du bya ba la sogs pa byas nas so so'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2631:130b-21: snying po rnams brjod pas blta bar bya ste /
T02D2631:130b-25: zhes pa'i bar gyis blta bar bya'o //
T02D2631:130b-26: de nas rang gi lus la phyag rgya dang /
T02D2631:130b-27: sngags kyi sbyor ba bsdus pa las /
T02D2631:130b-28: rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyis bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rang gi lus la bcug ste /
T02D2631:130b-29: phyag rgya bzhes rgyas gdab par bya ba ste /
T02D2631:130b-30: badzra tsakra dri shya dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam aa ham /
T02D2631:130b-32: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i snying po lan bdun brjod la /
T02D2631:130b-33: de bzhin du ngan song sbyong ba dang /
T02D2631:130b-36: me tog rgyas pa rnams kyi snying po brjod la sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pas /
T02D2631:130b-37: aom buddha lo tsa ni h'um /
T02D2631:130b-38: zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags kyis snying ga la sogs pa'i gnas su byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2631:130b-39: rnal 'byor chen pos ni gzhal yas khang la sogs
T02D2631:130b-40: pa med pa yang mngon par byang chub lngas bskyed
T02D2631:130b-41: la / cho ga thams cad spyad par bya ste /
T02D2631:130b-42: mngon du byed pa pos ni /
T02D2631:130b-43: de'i rjes la rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid las
T02D2631:130b-44: byung ba phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi la sbyar bar
T02D2631:130b-45: byas te / de la dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni rdo rje bsdams pa las byung bas na /
T02D2631:130b-46: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings byas la //
T02D2631:130b-47: de nyid lte bar ting 'dzin gnas //
T02D2631:130b-48: de las mthe bong mthe chung mdud //
T02D2631:130b-49: mdzub mo srin lag rin chen 'dra //
T02D2631:130b-50: mthe bong mthe chung pad snying po //
T02D2631:131a-2: de bzhin ral gri 'dra ba dang //
T02D2631:131a-3: mdzub mo rdo rje 'dra ba dang //
T02D2631:131a-4: gung mo dag ni rin chen te //
T02D2631:131a-7: mdzub mo rdo rje 'dra ba las //
T02D2631:131a-8: de nyid lcags kyu'i rnam par bkug / me tog mda' gzhu 'dra ba dang //
T02D2631:131a-9: legs so zhes par brjod pa ni //
T02D2631:131a-10: rdo rje sems dpa' bzhi po yin //
T02D2631:131a-11: mdzub mo rin chen 'dra ba dang //
T02D2631:131a-12: mthe bong gshibs te gzhan rnams bsnol //
T02D2631:131a-13: de las srin lag mthe chung gnyis //
T02D2631:131a-14: mnyam par gshibs pa rgyal mtshan te //
T02D2631:131a-15: de las bskor te kha phyogs gzhag / srin lag padma chos kyi ste //
T02D2631:131a-16: srin lag ral gri rnon po yin //
T02D2631:131a-17: lag gnyis mtheb mdzub zlum po ni //
T02D2631:131a-18: 'khor lo yi ni phyag rgyar grags //
T02D2631:131a-19: srin lag rtse sprad tshigs gnyis dgu / khar gzhag pa ni gzung ba ste //
T02D2631:131a-20: mthe bong mthe chung rtse sprad dgyed //
T02D2631:131a-21: las kyi rdo rjer bshad pa yin //
T02D2631:131a-22: de las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang nas //
T02D2631:131a-23: mthe bong snying gar brkyang pa'o //
T02D2631:131a-24: mdzum [*mdzub] mo gnyis dgu mche ba la //
T02D2631:131a-25: mthe bong gung mo kha 'dra ba //
T02D2631:131a-26: gnod sbyin gyi ni yin pa ste //
T02D2631:131a-27: mthe chung gnyis par mthe bong gnyis //
T02D2631:131a-28: mdzub mo gnyis kyis btsir ba'o //
T02D2631:131a-29: snying gar mthe bong mnyam par gshibs //
T02D2631:131a-30: rab tu brkyang ba phreng ba ste //
T02D2631:131a-31: thal sbyar kha yi thad kar gzhag / de las bsnol te rab bskor dang //
T02D2631:131a-32: rdo rje bcings pa kha spub dang //
T02D2631:131a-33: thal mo kha phye gyen du 'thor //
T02D2631:131a-34: g-yas pa'i mtheb bsgreng g-yon pas 'khyud //
T02D2631:131a-35: rdo rje bsdams brkyang dbyug pa'o //
T02D2631:131a-36: mdzub mo g-yas pa bkug pa dang //
T02D2631:131a-37: mtheb mdzub gnyis ni mdud pa dor //
T02D2631:131a-38: mthe bong mdzub mo gdu bur bcing //
T02D2631:131a-39: rdo rje bcings pa mdzub mo bsdams //
T02D2631:131a-40: rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bskyed pa gsal bar bya'o //
T02D2631:131a-41: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ljags la chos kyi phyag rgya dgod par bya ste /
T02D2631:131a-42: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rdo rje la dgod par bya ste /
T02D2631:131a-48: sarba ne tra a'a ta ma su kha /
T02D2631:131b-0: aa ho @131b su kha s'a dhu s'a dhu /
T02D2631:131b-19: su ti tsi ga / su gandha gre /
T02D2631:131b-24: de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
T02D2631:131b-25: gung mo sbyar ba byas pa las //
T02D2631:131b-26: g-yas pa yi ni gung mo bsgreng //
T02D2631:131b-27: g-yon pa'i spu gur bcug nas ni //
T02D2631:131b-28: gzhan rnams brkyang pa byang chub mchog / ngan song
T02D2631:131b-29: kun spyong sa la reg / rin chen gyi ni
T02D2631:131b-30: mchog sbyin te // sh'akya thub pa'i chos bshad mchog / mi 'jigs sbyin pa me tog gi'o /
T02D2631:131b-31: spyan gyi mig dang 'dra ba ste //
T02D2631:131b-32: m'a ma k'i ni rdo rje 'dra //
T02D2631:131b-33: dkar mo padma nyid du bshad //
T02D2631:131b-34: autpa la ni sgrol mar dgongs //
T02D2631:131b-35: rdo rje blangs nas gsor ba dang //
T02D2631:131b-36: lag gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul gnas dang /
T02D2631:131b-37: gzhu 'gengs pa yi sbyor ba dang //
T02D2631:131b-38: legs pa'i se gol snying gar gnas //
T02D2631:131b-39: lag gnyis rdo rje dbang bskur ba //
T02D2631:131b-40: snying gar nyi ma rab tu ston //
T02D2631:131b-41: g-yon pa'i gru mo g-yas pas gzung //
T02D2631:131b-42: de las phyir zlog rab tu dgyes //
T02D2631:131b-43: shes rab thabs kyi padma dgyes //
T02D2631:131b-44: snying gar po ti ral gri phyar //
T02D2631:131b-45: mgal me lta bu'i 'khor lo bskor //
T02D2631:131b-46: rdo rje gnyis ni kha 'gram gnas //
T02D2631:131b-47: rdo rje gar gyis bskor nas dgrol //
T02D2631:131b-48: spyi bor thal mo mnyam par sbyor //

T02D2631:138a-21: rdo rje rtse lnga pa nam mkha'i khams thams cad
T02D2631:138a-22: du khyab pa'i gzugs su gyur to //
T02D2631:138a-23: de'i lte ba la gnas pa byang chub kyi sems rin po che yongs su dag pa /
T02D2631:138a-24: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro bar byed
T02D2631:138a-25: pa'i 'od zer la padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng
T02D2631:138a-26: du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la phyag rgya bzhi pa'i
T02D2631:138a-27: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na ngan song thams cad yongs
T02D2631:138a-28: su sbyong ba la sogs pa bde bar gshegs pa

T02D2631:138a-33: la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis yang dag par gnas te

T02D2631:138a-36: sems dag pa dang bcas par mdzad pa dang /
T02D2631:138b-0: yid @138b dang bar mdzad pa dang /
T02D2631:138b-1: rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2631:138b-2: ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal ba dang /
T02D2631:138b-3: sbyin pa phun sum tshogs par mdzad pa dang /
T02D2631:138b-4: 'dzum pa rmad du byung ba la nges par sbyor ba dang /
T02D2631:138b-5: rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs par mdzad pa dang /
T02D2631:138b-6: nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa dang /
T02D2631:138b-7: bdud dpung ma lus pa rtsad nas 'byin par mdzad pa dang /
T02D2631:138b-8: lkugs pa thams cad smra bar mdzad pa dang /
T02D2631:138b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa mdzad pa dang /
T02D2631:138b-10: 'jigs pa thams cad srung ba dang /
T02D2631:138b-11: bsrung ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa dang /
T02D2631:138b-13: dag dang sems mnyam pa nyid du gcig par mdzad pa dang /
T02D2631:138b-14: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
T02D2631:138b-17: mngon par 'du mi byed pa la sbyor ba dang /
T02D2631:138b-25: thabs rdzogs par bya ba dang /

T02D2631:138b-28: theg pa dman pa la mos pa rnams kyi sems 'jig par mdzad pa dang /
T02D2631:138b-29: rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing skye ba med par mdzad pa dang /
T02D2631:138b-30: sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa tshad med pa la skyong bar mdzad pa ste /
T02D2631:138b-31: slar sems can thams cad dang lhan cig tu de
T02D2631:138b-32: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ngan song thams cad
T02D2631:138b-33: yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor du bkug ste bcug
T02D2631:138b-34: nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las sprul pa'i bum
T02D2631:138b-36: phred ba la sogs pa'i dbang rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2631:138b-37: dbang bskur ba las khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi sras po nyid du gyur pa ste /
T02D2631:138b-38: thams cad du yang rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur
T02D2631:138b-39: ba las kun kyang bskal pa 'di snyed kyi de
T02D2631:138b-40: bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya

T02D2631:138b-42: mchod pa'i tshogs kyis yang dag par mchod nas /

T02D2631:138b-45: sangs rgyas mdzad pa ngo mtshar che //
T02D2631:139a-2: sems can glog bzhin myur du sgrol //
T02D2631:139a-3: zhes yongs su bstod pas bsam par bya'o //
T02D2631:139a-4: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad

T02D2631:139a-6: thams cad du padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du
T02D2631:139a-7: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs shing ting nge 'dzin
T02D2631:139a-8: gyi phyag rgya dang ldan par byas nas gnas par
T02D2631:139a-9: byas la / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2631:139a-10: 'khor lo ni rab tu gsal ba'i bdag nyid du
T02D2631:139a-12: de dag gis ni las kyi rgyal ba mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin bstan to /
T02D2631:139a-15: // / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil
T02D2631:139a-16: 'khor chen po de nyid ni bcom ldan 'das rnam
T02D2631:139a-17: par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2631:139a-18: la rtsibs bcu drug pa'i gzugs /
T02D2631:139a-19: rdo rje'i dbyings chen po ste /
T02D2631:139a-20: thams cad kyang rdo rje'i bu tshur mkhrig ma bsnol
T02D2631:139a-21: la bzlog cing bzlog pas se gol gdab par bya
T02D2631:139a-22: ste / se gol de nyid rdo rje lcags kyu'i

T02D2631:139a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi yum thams cad /
T02D2631:139a-27: aom badzra sa m'a dza: dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02D2631:139a-28: zhes bya bas dgug pa dang /
T02D2631:139a-31: dbang du bya ba las rdo rje bsdu bar bya ste /
T02D2631:139a-32: de nyid du 'khod par gyur pa dang /
T02D2631:139a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
T02D2631:139a-34: dang thugs rdo rje thams cad 'dus par gyur pa

T02D2631:139a-36: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya'i gzugs rdo rje chen po'i lte ba la gnas par gyur nas /
T02D2631:139a-37: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam ma lus pa thams
T02D2631:139a-38: cad thugs kyi yi ge mchog tu gyur pa'i thig
T02D2631:139a-39: le la gnas par gyur to //
T02D2631:139a-40: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i yon tan
T02D2631:139a-41: thams cad kyis rgyas par gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das
T02D2631:139a-42: rnam par snang mdzad chen po rgyan thams cad kyis
T02D2631:139a-43: brgyan pa rab tu gnas shing /

T02D2631:139a-45: sems rtse gcig pa nyid kyis gnas par bya'o //
T02D2631:139b-0: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams @139b cad kyi
T02D2631:139b-1: thugs kar gnas pa de nyid la sems rtse gcig
T02D2631:139b-2: pa nyid kyis ni bdag nyid kyi sems /
T02D2631:139b-3: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2631:139b-4: dbyings su gyur pa rnam par snang mdzad gang chen
T02D2631:139b-5: mtsho'i bdag nyid du gyur to //
T02D2631:139b-6: de ltar ji srid du skyo bar ma gyur gyi bar de srid du bsgoms la /
T02D2631:139b-7: de nas rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sbyor bas sngags bzlas par bya ste /
T02D2631:139b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas
T02D2631:139b-9: rig pa chen mo rtsa ba'i sngags zla ba'i 'od
T02D2631:139b-10: zer lta bu byung ba dang /
T02D2631:139b-11: ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba la sogs
T02D2631:139b-12: pa dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi zhal nas kyang rtsa
T02D2631:139b-13: ba'i rig pa chen mo de nyid la brten te
T02D2631:139b-14: rang rang gi snying po'i sngags kyi sgra 'byung bar
T02D2631:139b-15: bsams nas rdo rje'i bzlas pa la brtson par byas
T02D2631:139b-16: na / dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi bzlas pa byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2631:139b-17: de ltar rdo rje'i bzlas pa 'bum phrag dang /
T02D2631:139b-19: brgya phrag la sogs pa bzlas nas mnyam par gzhag
T02D2631:139b-20: pa las langs par gyur pa'i tshe mchod pa thams
T02D2631:139b-21: cad kyis yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2631:139b-22: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas kyang bstod par bya'o //

T02D2631:139b-24: bo nyid kyis rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te
T02D2631:139b-25: / rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje dbyings kyi bar
T02D2631:139b-26: du phyag rgya thams cad bkrol la rdo rje 'dzin
T02D2631:139b-27: ma'i phyag rgya dam pas bkrol zhing /
T02D2631:139b-28: badzra mu: zhes pas phyag rgya thams cad nam mkha'i phyogs su bstan la /
T02D2631:139b-29: rdo rje go cha'i sbyor bas bdag nyid la gnas
T02D2631:139b-30: ji lta ba bzhin du bsdu ba'i sna tshogs rdo
T02D2631:139b-31: rje'i go bgos la yi ge brgya pa bzlas nas

T02D2631:139b-35: dge ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las thams cad dang ldan par gyur nas /
T02D2631:139b-36: sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba thams cad spangs nas /
T02D2631:139b-37: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sa
T02D2631:139b-38: la gnas par gyur cig ces dge ba'i rtsa ba
T02D2631:139b-39: bsngo bar bya'o // de nas me tog lag par thogs pas /
T02D2631:139b-40: bdag gi phyag rgya sngags rnams dang //
T02D2631:139b-41: bsam gtan 'khrul dang nyams pa rnams //
T02D2631:139b-42: de bzhin lha tshogs nyams pa kun //
T02D2631:139b-43: dkyil 'khor bcas pas bzod par mdzod //
T02D2631:140a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings su
T02D2631:140a-3: lha la sogs pa thams cad kyis rol mo sna
T02D2631:140a-4: tshogs pa nam mkha' las sgrogs pas gshegs par mos
T02D2631:140a-5: pa bskyed de / aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D2631:140a-6: ji ltar mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02D2631:140a-7: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02D2631:140a-8: slar yang gshegs par mdzad du gsol //
T02D2631:140a-9: zhes bya bas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad gshegs su gsol bar bya'o /
T02D2631:140a-11: // / de nas nyams pa med pa'i rnal 'byor pa
T02D2631:140a-12: mngon par brtson pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyis slob
T02D2631:140a-13: ma rnams kyi don du dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i
T02D2631:140a-15: de yang re zhig dang por gnas gtsang ma rang
T02D2631:140a-16: gi yid dang rjes su mthun pa rnams su nyi
T02D2631:140a-17: ma bzang po la rab tu zhugs la ba'i rnam
T02D2631:140a-18: pa lnga dang / dri dang byug ba la sogs pas nye reg byas te /
T02D2631:140a-19: aa ga ru la sogs pa'i bdug pas bdugs shing spos kyi dkyil 'khor khru drug pa'am /
T02D2631:140a-22: de'i rjes su padma 'dab ma brgyad pa snying dang ze 'brur ldan pa bris te /
T02D2631:140a-23: de'i steng du bum pa dkar po gcig la rigs
T02D2631:140a-24: lnga'i phyag rgyas mtshan pa rnam par snang mdzad bskyed
T02D2631:140a-28: 'bru la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs pa bcug ste /
T02D2631:140a-29: ras dkar pos mgul la dkris shing me tog phreng ba la sogs pas brgyan pa bzhag ste /
T02D2631:140a-30: de'i shar phyogs kyi 'dab ma la bgegs mthar byed kyi bum pa snga ma lta bu bzhag la /
T02D2631:140a-31: dkar po la sogs pa'i tshon sna lnga'i skud pas btags te /
T02D2631:140a-32: mchod pa lngas yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D2631:140a-34: yi ge brgya pas sdig pa thams cad bshags par bya'o //
T02D2631:140a-35: de nas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa bsgoms la /
T02D2631:140a-36: mdun gyi bar snang la nam mkha'i khams thams cad
T02D2631:140a-37: du khyab pa'i sems las padma dmar po 'dab ma
T02D2631:140a-38: stong dang ldan pas khyab par gyur pa dang /
T02D2631:140a-39: de'i steng du h'um nag po las rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'od dang bcas pa bsams la /
T02D2631:140a-40: de gyur pa las bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen por bsams te /
T02D2631:140b-2: spyi bo rnams su sangs rgyas spyan dang /
T02D2631:140b-5: sgrol ma rnams sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis rgyas btab la /
T02D2631:140b-6: ma h'a sa ma ya satva ha /
T02D2631:140b-8: de las rdo rje rgyu'i phyag rgya bcas pas /
T02D2631:140b-10: zhes pa'i sngags lan bdun bzlas pas /
T02D2631:140b-11: ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2631:140b-12: gyi 'khor lo ma lus par sprul la phyag rgya
T02D2631:140b-13: bzhis nye bar spyad par bya'o //
T02D2631:140b-14: de nas ye shes kyi 'khor lo rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sbyor bas /
T02D2631:140b-19: dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya ho aa ham /
T02D2631:140b-21: mchod pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod do //
T02D2631:140b-22: de nas mthun pa'i bar du mchod pa dang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod la /
T02D2631:140b-23: rgyal po'i ni zla ba gsum pa'am /
T02D2631:140b-24: blon po'i zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig go //
T02D2631:140b-25: dmangs rigs rnams kyi ni zhag bdun pa'o //
T02D2631:140b-26: rnal 'byor pa'i ni ji srid mtshan ma ma byung gi bar du ste /
T02D2631:140b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga la ni 'bum phrag gam brgya phrag re re'o //
T02D2631:140b-28: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i ni thams cad
T02D2631:140b-29: du de'i dbye ba nyid las shes par bya ste
T02D2631:140b-30: / tha ma'i tshang la ni nyi shu rtsa gcig tu gsungs so //
T02D2631:140b-31: de la rnam par snang mdzad kyi ni rtsa ba'i sngags nyid de /
T02D2631:140b-32: de bzhin du ngan song sbyong ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D2631:140b-34: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D2631:140b-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i snying po nyid do //
T02D2631:140b-38: shar phyogs kyi bum pa la ni /
T02D2631:140b-39: rdo rje dang bcas pas bgegs mthar byed kyi snying po 'bum la sogs pa bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2631:140b-40: rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sbyor bas gsang sngags thams cad bzlas par gyur pa dang /
T02D2631:140b-41: de nyid du rnal 'byor pa sems mchog tu gyur pa rnams la /
T02D2631:140b-43: de la lha'i bu'am rgyal po la sogs pas 'bras
T02D2631:140b-44: bu la sogs pa byin pa ni rab tu gyur
T02D2631:140b-45: pa'o // rang gi ma'am sru mo la sogs pas
T02D2631:140b-46: 'jig rten pa'i kha zas byin pa ni bar ma'o
T02D2631:140b-47: pa'o // // de bzhin du gnyen nam mi gang yang rung bas kha zas ro dang ldan ba'am /
T02D2631:141a-0: padma'i sdong bus mgo bcings pa ni tha @141a * //
T02D2631:141a-2: rigs ngan shin tu gnag pa rnams mthong na mi
T02D2631:141a-3: rung bar gyur pa nyid kyis sreg blugs la sogs
T02D2631:141a-4: pa mchod sbyin chen po bya ba nyid do //
T02D2631:141a-5: de nas rdo rje bzlas pa rdzogs par gyur pa dang /
T02D2631:141a-6: bum pa de nyid bar snang gi nam mkha' la
T02D2631:141a-7: rdo rje bslang ba'i phyag rgya nyid kyis 'jog par
T02D2631:141a-8: nus pa dang / rdo rje dang dril bu bar snang la gnas par byed nus par 'gyur ro //
T02D2631:141a-9: de ltar rnal 'byor pa zas dkar gsum la longs spyod pa dang /
T02D2631:141a-10: bud med la sogs pa spangs pas /
T02D2631:141a-12: mtshan mo lan drug gi bar du mchod pa dang /
T02D2631:141a-13: gtor ma byas te bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T02D2631:141a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po las thams cad grub
T02D2631:141a-15: pa byed pas mar gyi sreg blugs stong du tshang
T02D2631:141a-16: bar bya ste / de dag ni sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D2631:141a-18: // / de'i 'og tu dkyil 'khor chen po'i las brtsam par bya ste /
T02D2631:141a-19: de la rgyal po la sogs pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kyi ni khru brgya'am lnga bcu'o //
T02D2631:141a-20: blon po'am tshong dpon rnams kyi ni khru lnga bcu'o //
T02D2631:141a-21: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi khru bcu drug gam /
T02D2631:141a-23: de yang re zhig tshes gcig la sogs pa yar
T02D2631:141a-24: gyi ngo'i nyin par mngon bar 'dod pa'i sa phyogs
T02D2631:141a-26: rgyal po gdug pa can nam /
T02D2631:141a-27: gcan gzan nam chom po'am sbrul la sogs pa brtag par bya'o //
T02D2631:141a-28: de nas med par gyur pa dang /
T02D2631:141a-29: sa'i bdag po rnams la sa phyogs der dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs pa'i phyir bslang bar bgyi'o //
T02D2631:141a-30: des byin par gyur pa dang yan lag thams cad
T02D2631:141a-31: dang ldan pa'i sa'i dbus su mi rus kyi phye
T02D2631:141a-32: ma dang / dug dang ske tshe dang shing tsher
T02D2631:141a-33: ma can la sogs pas thab khung gru gsum pa'i
T02D2631:141a-34: dbus su bgegs thams cad kyi lus dang /
T02D2631:141a-35: ngag dang yid rnam pa gsum rgyas par rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bsreg par bya'o //

T02D2631:141a-39: khru gang du brkos pa dang /
T02D2631:141a-40: sa dkar snum pa rnams byung ba ni dngos grub bzang por gyur pa'o //
T02D2631:141b-0: rus dum la sogs pa byung na ni sa @141b phyogs de spang bar bya'o //

T02D2631:141b-2: pa bdun phyir bskyed de slar 'ongs pa las chu'i
T02D2631:141b-3: ri mo mnyam pa ni mchog tu gyur pa'o //

T02D2631:141b-5: aom sarba shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02D2631:141b-7: mchod pa rnam pa lngas yang dag par mchod de /

T02D2631:148a-34: lag pa bzhi pa g-yas pa gnyis kyis be con
T02D2631:148a-36: g-yon pa gnyis kyis 'khor lo dang dung 'dzin pa
T02D2631:148a-37: rang gi chung ma dang 'khor du bcas pa dgod
T02D2631:148a-38: par bya'o // byang phyogs su ni dbang phyug chen
T02D2631:148a-39: po kha dog nag po lag pa bzhi pa glang
T02D2631:148a-40: po che khyu mchog la zhon pa /
T02D2631:148a-41: lag pa gnyis kyis ril ba dang /
T02D2631:148b-0: g-yon pa gcig gis lha mo la 'khyud @148b cing ;
T02D2631:148b-1: tha ma sbyin pa byed pa 'khor dang bcas pa bri'o //

T02D2631:148b-4: yi dags kyi gnas su ni shin tu rid pa'i gzugs su bri'o //

T02D2631:148b-13: de dag gi nang du ni ri dang shing dang ;
T02D2631:148b-15: rdzing la sogs pa bri bar bya'o //

T02D2631:148b-24: aom sarba sra ba ke buddha su ta aa /

T02D2631:148b-62: aom de ba ye sarba sv'a h'a /
T02D2631:148b-67: lha ma yin rnams la ni /
T02D2631:148b-68: aom aa su r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2631:148b-71: aom tir++ya k'a ya sv'a h'a /

T02D2631:149a-6: aom sarba na ra ke sv'a h'a /

T02D2631:149a-11: de ltar dkyil 'khor legs par bkod nas /

T02D2631:149a-55: de nas yid kyis sgo bzhi dbye bar bya ste /
T02D2631:149a-56: aom badzra dha ra audgha ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha ya h'um /
T02D2631:149a-58: rdo rje mdzub mo legs par sbyar la bkan te
T02D2631:149a-59: mthe chung gnyis mdud la mthe bong khu tshur du

T02D2631:149b-0: de'i 'og tu stong pa nyid kyi mthar rdo rje gnod sbyin bzlas pa'i @149b chus ;
T02D2631:149b-1: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /

T02D2631:150b-8: aom s'u ka r'a sya h'um /

T02D2631:154b-27: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //

T02D2631:154b-33: rje byang chub kyi sems ni 'di yin par shes

T02D2631:154b-45: 'dod pa med pa'i sems kyis su //

T02D2631:155a-12: khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya //

T02D2631:155a-19: zhes bya ba rnams kyis dbang bskur la /

T02D2631:155a-30: rdo rje'i 'khor lo bskor bar gyis //

T02D2631:155b-0: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i bka' @155b bsgrags par bya ste /

T02D2631:155b-5: gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur gyur pa rnam par

T02D2631:155b-12: dang / la / aom buddha gu hya aa bhi shinytsa aom /

T02D2631:155b-14: aom ratna gu hya aa bhi shinytsa tr'am /

T02D2631:155b-23: 'khor la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs

T02D2631:155b-29: rdo rje ye shes mkha' 'dra ba //
T02D2631:155b-30: rtog pa thams cad bral ba ste //
T02D2631:155b-31: sgyu ma lta bu'i sems nyid sku //
T02D2631:155b-32: sems dpa'i rdo rje bla na med //
T02D2631:155b-34: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
T02D2631:155b-35: g-yon pas chos gos 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la /
T02D2631:155b-36: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du rkang pa gzhag ste /
T02D2631:155b-37: gdugs dkar po rin po che'i yu ba dang bcas pa phul te /
T02D2631:155b-38: bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs su bsgoms pas /
T02D2631:155b-39: slob ma la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02D2631:155b-40: gang khyod 'di mchog tu gsang ba'i cho gas lung bstan par byas pa las /
T02D2631:155b-41: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02D2631:156a-0: byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad kyis @156a * //
T02D2631:156a-1: 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams rin po che'i mdzod bla na med bzhes bya ba nas /

T02D2631:156a-3: / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
T02D2631:156a-4: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhes pa

T02D2631:156a-7: par sangs rgyas so zhes mgrin gcig tu lung bstan
T02D2631:156a-8: par mdzad do zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2631:156a-9: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta by'a ka ra n'a mi stvam /

T02D2631:156a-11: bha ba tu ga ti aa ti ta ra na

T02D2631:156a-15: chen po'i mchog tu sems bskyed pa tsam gyi mthu
T02D2631:156a-16: nyid kyis phyir mi ldog pa yin la /

T02D2631:156a-27: gi phyag rgya bcas pa las /

T02D2631:156a-39: badzra satva / hi hi hi hi h'um /
T02D2631:156a-40: zhes bya la rdo rje brtul zhugs 'dzin du gzhug go //

T02D2631:156b-6: chen por yongs su bsngos la /
T02D2631:156b-7: sangs rgyas thams cad gshegs su gsol la /
